articles.title: Magnesium Helps Reduce the Risk of Dementia – “Less Age-Related Brain Shrinkage” - SciTechDaily
articles.description: More magnesium in our daily diet leads to better brain health as we age, according to scientists from the Neuroimaging and Brain Lab at The Australian National University (ANU). The researchers say increased intake of magnesium-rich foods such as spinach and …
articles.content:
ByAustralian National UniversityMarch 25, 2023
